Package it.polimi.ingsw.client.reducedmodel

Class ReducedGame

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.client.reducedmodel.ReducedGame
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable
Direct Known Subclasses:
ReducedMultiPlayerMode, ReducedSoloMode
public abstract class ReducedGame
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
This class represents a simplified version of the Game with respect to the server's class. It contains only the information required client side.
See Also:
Serialized Form
